org.drip.function.rdtor1descent

Class WolfeEvolutionVerifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.function.rdtor1descent.LineEvolutionVerifier
      • org.drip.function.rdtor1descent.WolfeEvolutionVerifier

  • public class WolfeEvolutionVerifier
extends LineEvolutionVerifier
    WolfeEvolutionVerifier implements the Wolfe Criterion used for the Inexact Line Search Increment Generation. The References are: - Armijo, L. (1966): Minimization of Functions having Lipschitz-Continuous First Partial Derivatives, Pacific Journal of Mathematics 16 (1) 1-3. - Wolfe, P. (1969): Convergence Conditions for Ascent Methods, SIAM Review 11 (2) 226-235. - Wolfe, P. (1971): Convergence Conditions for Ascent Methods; II: Some Corrections, SIAM Review 13 (2) 185-188. - Nocedal, J., and S. Wright (1999): Numerical Optimization, Wiley.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
